name: CreateBlogTagLanguageVariation
description:
Create a new language variation from an existing blog tag.

Use this tool to create a language variation for an existing blog tag on HubSpot CMS. Call this tool when you need to support multiple languages for blog tags.

parameters.name: new_blog_tag_name
parameters.description: The name for the newly cloned blog tag language variation.

value_schema.description: Name of newly cloned blog tag.

parameters.name: blog_tag_id
parameters.description: ID of the existing blog tag to be cloned for creating a language variation.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

parameters.name: target_language_for_blog_tag_variation
parameters.description: Specifies the target language for the new blog tag variant.

parameters.name: primary_blog_tag_language
parameters.description: Specify the language code of the primary blog tag to be cloned, such as 'en', 'fr', etc.

value_schema.description: Language of primary blog tag to clone.
